oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Announcement of a mass meeting to discuss the boycott of Japanese made goods to prevent future devastation in China. Location: Carnegie Music Hall, Schenley Park. Speaker: Rep. John M. Coffee of Seattle, Washington andothers.
